channel.title: Eventide pitch factor
channel.description:
hi there,
does anybody have some insights how the pitchfactor generates the pitched voices? it is very low latency and sounds pretty good. all the diy programmed examples i have seen use either fft or a "tape delay" approach. both seem to introduce quite some latency or artifacts

item.title: Eventide pitch factor
item.dc:creator: @servandisco servando barreiro
item.description:
@servandisco wrote:

If you are into pd, check out the "3.ring-buffer-pitch.shift.pd" example from Alexandre Torres Porres live electronic music tutorial. awesome & quick

Read full topic
